name: Jurassic Park: Legacy
description:
Nearly 22 years since Nublar closed its theme park and fame with it. You return to reconstruct the park, Play through an immersive story and have all the Dinos!!!

BETA FOR MAC AND WINDOWS

MAC ALREADY RELEASED!

Extract with your favourite ZipExtractor!

Requirements:

OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 384 MB Memory: 4 GB 1333 MHz DDR3 Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel Core i5 Credits:

EpicGames- Engine and Assets Circle Five/Panic Button- Assets

OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
